extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisites     FREN212 and FREN220 and Level 4 and registration in a FREN or FRLG Plan.
Exclusion   No more than 3.0 units from FREN304; FREN404 or (FREN406).
Equivalency    FREN406.

basic.description: A study of representative literary works in the Middle Ages, including La Chanson de Roland, Tristan et Iseult, Le Roman de Renart, Le Roman de la Rose, Chrétien de Troyes, Rutebeuf and Villon. Travaux pratiques include tests, an oral presentation and an in-depth essay. Given jointly with FREN 304/3.0.
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: Introduction à la littérature française du Moyen Age
